com.azure.android.storage.blob.transfer

Class DownloadWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.work.ListenableWorker
      • com.azure.android.storage.blob.transfer.DownloadWorker

  • public class DownloadWorker
extends androidx.work.ListenableWorker
    ListenableWorker for performing a single blob download using DownloadHandler.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadWorker

        public DownloadWorker(@NonNull
                      android.content.Context appContext,
                      @NonNull
                      androidx.work.WorkerParameters workerParams)
        Create the download worker.

        TransferClient won't call this constructor directly, instead it will enqueue the work along with criteria to execute it. The WorkManager call this constructor when it identifies that the criteria are satisfied (e.g network is available).

        If criteria configured for the Worker is no longer met while it is executing, then WorkManager will stop the Worker by calling ListenableWorker.stop(). Such stopped Worker instance will be eventually GC-ed. When constraints are again satisfied and if the Worker was stopped without completion then WorkManager will create and starts new Worker instance.

        Parameters:
        appContext - The context.
        workerParams - The input parameters to the worker.

    • Method Detail

      • startWork

        @NonNull
public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<androidx.work.ListenableWorker.Result> startWork()
        WorkManager calls startWork() on the main thread, so it is important that the work this method does is lightweight. This method creates a DownloadHandler and delegate the blob download work.
        Specified by:
        startWork in class androidx.work.ListenableWorker
        Returns:
        The future representing the async download.

      • onStopped

        public void onStopped()
        Called by WorkManager to stop the work. This can happen if the constraints for execution are no longer satisfied or the user explicitly stopped the worker (e.g. cancel or pause download) or the Worker is executed for maximum time it is allowed to run.
        Overrides:
        onStopped in class androidx.work.ListenableWorker
